sentences.english: Dashu knows to lower his head when he wants to get under his bed.
sentences.chinese: 大樹爬進小牀的時候會把頭低下，匍匐前進。

sentences.english: This is more like the Creeping Crud.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的要更象是”匍匐前進的骯髒東西“。

sentences.english: The frightened slaves groveled at the feet of their cruel master.
sentences.chinese: 奴隸匍匐在殘暴的主人腳下。

sentences.english: A slender stolon or prostrate stem rooting at the nodes or at the tip.
sentences.chinese: 在節處和莖的先端生根的纖細匍匐莖。

sentences.english: The soldiers crept forward under the cover of darkness.
sentences.chinese: 士兵在白晝的迴護下向前匍匐。

sentences.english: Mario could crouch down, tuck his limbs into his shell and slide across the screen.
sentences.chinese: 馬里奧從此可以匍匐着把四肢收進殼裏，滑行前進。

sentences.english: Subterranean bine shows procumbent record level inclined to stretchy.
sentences.chinese: 地下莖呈匍匐狀水平斜向伸長。

sentences.english: From then on, without backer, the cirrus had to creep on ground and struggle for life.
sentences.chinese: 從此，藤蔓再無依恃，只能匍匐在地上苦苦掙扎求生。

sentences.english: Observe the seed production characteristics of creeping bentgrass.
sentences.chinese: 觀察了匍匐翦股穎的結實特性。

sentences.english: Why prefer to crawl through life?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼要在生活中匍匐前進呢？

sentences.english: Such as crawling down, support the body with his elbow alternately crawl as well.
sentences.chinese: 如往下爬行，用胳膊肘支撐身體交替着匍匐前進爲好。

sentences.english: Dichondra repens Forst. is a semi-phototaxis perennial and stoloniferous lawn plant.
sentences.chinese: 馬蹄金是一種匍匐生根型的多年生半陽性草坪草。

sentences.english: Plants usually small with thin stolons.
sentences.chinese: 植物通常嬌小，匍匐莖纖細。

sentences.english: He crawl on his belly under the lee of a stone dyke.
sentences.chinese: 他在一條石堤的掩護下匍匐前進。

sentences.english: Then he prostrates himself and kisses the brethren's knees (On Repentance 9 – 12).
sentences.chinese: 然後他匍匐地上，親吻教友的膝蓋。

sentences.english: The stolon primordium appears to be associated with an active outward growth by the shell zone.
sentences.chinese: 殼狀區的形成對匍匐莖原基的外凸起一定作用。

definition: to kneel down/to sink to one's knees/to grovel
to curl up/to lie with knees drawn up/to huddle up
to land/to touch the ground/also pr. [zhuo2 di4]
